content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OPENROWSET (
        BULK ''https://amnateuap2.dfs.core.windows.net/amnateuap2fs/testdata.snappy.parquet''
       ,FORMAT = ''PARQUET'' 
    ) AS[r];'


        -- https://amnateuap2.dfs.core.windows.net/amnateuap2fs/testdata.snappy.parquet
